docs.text: FLPInspect A GUI tool to inspect and modify an FLP. FLPInspect , is a GUI tool to inspect the internal event structure which is abstracted by PyFLP . You can read and edit FLP files. Installation pip install --upgrade flpinspect More ways More Screenshots Project Goals & Known Issues License FLPInspect is licensed under the GNU Public License v3
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: A GUI tool to inspect and modify an FLP. FLPInspect , is a GUI tool to inspect the internal event structure which is abstracted by PyFLP . You can read and edit FLP files.
docs.title: FLPInspect

docs.text: FLPInspect is licensed under the GNU Public License v3
docs.title: License

docs.text: Installation FLPInspect require Python 3.6+ Via pip [ Recommended ]: pip install --upgrade flpinspect Via GitHub releases Install required dependencies: pip install -rrequirements.txt Note for Mac users Although FLPInspect is cross-platform, Tkinter has some issues with Mac, I don't have a Mac to test myself. The bugs will only be minor UI bugs at most.
